text: "Tell Me Something I Don't Know" is a song by Selena Gomez. It was released as a single on August 5, 2008 on iTunes. A Radio Disney version (which removes the Hurricane Katrina reference) was released on September 9, 2008, on iTunes. The song is on the Kidz Bop 15 CD. A new version of the song is on Selena Gomez & the Scene's debut album, Kiss & Tell. ==Chart performance== The song peaked at number 58 on the US Billboard Hot 100 chart at 13 on the Australian Hitseekers Singles chart and at 1 on the Malaysia Muzik Singles & Urban Chart. ==Music video== The music video starts with scenes reminiscent of (but not from) the film; Gomez cleaning a house and the maid yelling at her. Gomez then leaves the house and does a dance routine with her backup dancers, while the maid watches from the house window. The video also features Gomez in front of a black background with lyrics from the song (such as "I'm ready for it" and "One in a million") flying around her. ==Charts== Chart (2008-09) Peak position Australian Hitseekers Singles 13 Malay Muzik Hot 100 1 Malaysia Muzik Official Chart 1 Malaysia Muzik Urban Chart 1 US Billboard Hot 100 58 ==Release history== Country Date Format Label United States August 5, 2008 Digital download Razor & Tie Australia Taiwan November 3, 2008 Sony Music Entertainment Malaysia 28 September 2008 December 24, 2008 Indonesia January 6, 2009 Category:2008 songs Category:Selena Gomez songs
title: Tell Me Something I Don't Know
